title: >>> Spring BREAK
body_text:
What a wild, cream-filled massacre at DODGEBALL LXXXI. It's safe to say it will undoubtedly live among the most unforgettable events in dodgeball's year and half run.
Just released are two more videos of the "deadly"
CREAMations
of Lenny Herrera and John Tronolone, compliments of the one and only Tom Adams.
DODGEBALL 82
It's been an unreal couple of weeks for anyone involved.
Those of you disappointed in this week's "spring break", fear not!
DODGEBALL 82
comes to you live next Saturday night,
April 7
. This spectacle is already making headlines as the legendary Dan Spengeman has created yet another master piece poster. The unveiling will come next week!
As for the on-court excitement, it's perhaps the biggest redebut in history ... and it's not a person!
*Subject to Change*
body_html:
What a wild, cream-filled massacre at DODGEBALL LXXXI. It's safe to say it will undoubtedly live among the most unforgettable events in dodgeball's year and half run.

Just released are two more videos of the "deadly" CREAMations of Lenny Herrera and John Tronolone, compliments of the one and only Tom Adams.


DODGEBALL 82
It's been an unreal couple of weeks for anyone involved.

Those of you disappointed in this week's "spring break", fear not! DODGEBALL 82 comes to you live next Saturday night, April 7. This spectacle is already making headlines as the legendary Dan Spengeman has created yet another master piece poster. The unveiling will come next week!

As for the on-court excitement, it's perhaps the biggest redebut in history ... and it's not a person!
*Subject to Change*
